mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT N.*, M.M_NAME FROM NOTICE N, MEMBERS M WHERE N.N_M_NO = M.M_NO ORDER BY N.N_NO DESC) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
SELECT M.M_NAME, N.* FROM NOTICE N, MEMBERS M WHERE N_NO = #{n_no} AND N.N_M_NO = M.M_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (N_NO, N_TITLE, N_M_NO, N_CONTENT, N_DATE, N_HIT, N_FILENAME) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, SYSDATE, 0, #{param4})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT N.*, M.M_NAME FROM NOTICE N, MEMBERS M WHERE N.N_M_NO = M.M_NO AND ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' (N_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR N_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%') ORDER BY N.N_NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
